name: Fiend Piece Golem
desc: If you control a Fiend Tuner: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can decrease its Level by up to 2. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material for "Red Dragon Archfiend" or a monster that mentions it: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Fiend Piece Golem" once per turn.
